title: BimlFlex Staged Query concept
description: A Staged Query is a database query that is used to create a specific representation of data, so that this can be used in the BimlFlex framework as a 'source' object. A staged query is a specific Object Type, defined at Object level when creating, or modifying, a staged query object.

frontMatter.title: BimlFlex Staged Query concept
frontMatter.summary: Overview of the Staged Query concept in BimlFlex
